creator: paulbp@knology.net
text:
Tried to start the server manually without success. Further investigation 
leads me to believe I need the httpd.pid and httpd.lock files.

Any help is appreciated. I need to get my apache server working on Fedora Core 
4 OS.

This seems to be a typical question for the users mailing list
(http://httpd.apache.org/lists.html#http-users) and does not seem to be a bug.
Thus I close it. Please post your question to the mailing list above.
creator: rpluem@apache.org
